body: mutation {updatemerchantprovidergroup (merchantprovidergroup: {id: "b7d15779-88e5-485c-b372-6dc9c9c7c58c", name: "Edited merchant provider group", merchantproviders: [{id:"6c40761d-8919-4ad6-884d-6a46a776cfb9", distribution:0.7 }, {id:"79189a4a-ed89-4742-aa96-afcd7f6c08fb", distribution:0.7 } ] } ) { id, name, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio, transaction_counts { daily, weekly, monthly } }, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at } }
